msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Yo! I have the exact same as you!Exceptmine's not actually the same. Yours is custom, isn't it?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ooh, what I wouldn't give for a signature
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You've got a SWEET souped-up there.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I have one too, but it doesn't hold a candle to yours.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />No way! I have the exact same as you!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />We're totally locked in, style-wise. Maybe we should open up a boutique together! Ha! <10_4 />I'm kidding, of course. Unless, you know, you're into it

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your looks just like mine, but also different somehow Did you customize it?<10_4 /> That is SO cool. Why didn't I think of that?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Who says I can't still do it? Look out for a custom soon!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Weird! I've got the exact same at my place too! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Are we roommates and I just didn't know it?
